metadata.title: Calculating gene activity scores from scATAC-seq

params.note: ATAC-seq fragments in the gene body plus promoter (2 kb upstream from transcription start sites) of all protein-coding genes were summed for each cell to generate 'gene activity scores'.
A matrix was constructed for all gene activity scores by all cells.
The MAGIC63 imputation method, as implemented in the SnapATAC package, was used to impute gene activity scores based on the k-nearest neighbour graph.
